problem_names:
lemma inf_wf_to_step_inf_wf:
  assumes "well_founded order"
  shows "inf_wf r order n x \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y"

lemma inf_wf_to_inf:
  assumes "well_founded order"
  shows "inf_wf r order n x \<Longrightarrow> inf r x"

lemma step_inf:
  assumes
    deterministic: "\<And>x y z. r x y \<Longrightarrow> r x z \<Longrightarrow> y = z"
  shows "r x y \<Longrightarrow> inf r x \<Longrightarrow> inf r y"

lemma star_inf:
  assumes
    deterministic: "\<And>x y z. r x y \<Longrightarrow> r x z \<Longrightarrow> y = z"
  shows "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y \<Longrightarrow> inf r x \<Longrightarrow> inf r y"
translations:
lemma inf_wf_to_step_inf_wf:
  assumes "well_founded order"
  shows "inf_wf r order n x \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inf_wf r order n x \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
proof (induction n arbitrary: x rule: well_founded.induct[OF assms(1)])

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y xa.
                   \<lbrakk>order y x; inf_wf r order y xa\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m.
  r xa y \<and> inf_wf r order m y;
        inf_wf r order x xa\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r xa y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
case (1 n)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>order ?y n; inf_wf r order ?y ?x\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r ?x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
  inf_wf r order n x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>y xa.
                   \<lbrakk>order y x; inf_wf r order y xa\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m.
  r xa y \<and> inf_wf r order m y;
        inf_wf r order x xa\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r xa y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
from "1.prems"(1)

proof (chain)
picking this:
  inf_wf r order n x
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  inf_wf r order n x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
proof (induction rule: inf_wf.cases)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>n m x.
       \<lbrakk>n = m; x = x; order n m; inf_wf r order n x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
 2. \<And>x y n m.
       \<lbrakk>n = m; x = x; r\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x y;
        inf_wf r order n y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
case (inf_wf m n' x')

proof (state)
this:
  n = n'
  x = x'
  order m n'
  inf_wf r order m x'

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>n m x.
       \<lbrakk>n = m; x = x; order n m; inf_wf r order n x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
 2. \<And>x y n m.
       \<lbrakk>n = m; x = x; r\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x y;
        inf_wf r order n y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  n = n'
  x = x'
  order m n'
  inf_wf r order m x'
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  n = n'
  x = x'
  order m n'
  inf_wf r order m x'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
using "1.IH"

proof (prove)
using this:
  n = n'
  x = x'
  order m n'
  inf_wf r order m x'
  \<lbrakk>order ?y n; inf_wf r order ?y ?x\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r ?x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y n m.
       \<lbrakk>n = m; x = x; r\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x y;
        inf_wf r order n y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y n m.
       \<lbrakk>n = m; x = x; r\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x y;
        inf_wf r order n y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
case (inf_wf_step x' y m n')

proof (state)
this:
  n = n'
  x = x'
  r\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x' y
  inf_wf r order m y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y n m.
       \<lbrakk>n = m; x = x; r\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x y;
        inf_wf r order n y\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  n = n'
  x = x'
  r\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x' y
  inf_wf r order m y
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  n = n'
  x = x'
  r\<^sup>+\<^sup>+ x' y
  inf_wf r order m y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y
by (metis converse_tranclpE inf_wf.inf_wf_step)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma inf_wf_to_inf:
  assumes "well_founded order"
  shows "inf_wf r order n x \<Longrightarrow> inf r x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inf_wf r order n x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r x
proof (coinduction arbitrary: x n rule: inf.coinduct)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa n.
       inf_wf r order n xa \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>x y.
          xa = x \<and>
          r x y \<and>
          ((\<exists>x n. y = x \<and> inf_wf r order n x) \<or>
           Inf.inf r y)
case (inf x n)

proof (state)
this:
  inf_wf r order n x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa n.
       inf_wf r order n xa \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>x y.
          xa = x \<and>
          r x y \<and>
          ((\<exists>x n. y = x \<and> inf_wf r order n x) \<or>
           Inf.inf r y)
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  inf_wf r order n x
obtain y m where "r x y" and "inf_wf r order m y"

proof (prove)
using this:
  inf_wf r order n x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>y m.
        \<lbrakk>r x y; inf_wf r order m y\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using inf_wf_to_step_inf_wf[OF assms(1) inf(1)]

proof (prove)
using this:
  inf_wf r order n x
  \<exists>y m. r x y \<and> inf_wf r order m y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>y m.
        \<lbrakk>r x y; inf_wf r order m y\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by metis

proof (state)
this:
  r x y
  inf_wf r order m y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa n.
       inf_wf r order n xa \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>x y.
          xa = x \<and>
          r x y \<and>
          ((\<exists>x n. y = x \<and> inf_wf r order n x) \<or>
           Inf.inf r y)
thus ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  r x y
  inf_wf r order m y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>x y.
       x = x \<and>
       r x y \<and>
       ((\<exists>x n. y = x \<and> inf_wf r order n x) \<or> Inf.inf r y)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>x y.
     x = x \<and>
     r x y \<and>
     ((\<exists>x n. y = x \<and> inf_wf r order n x) \<or> Inf.inf r y)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma step_inf:
  assumes
    deterministic: "\<And>x y z. r x y \<Longrightarrow> r x z \<Longrightarrow> y = z"
  shows "r x y \<Longrightarrow> inf r x \<Longrightarrow> inf r y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>r x y; Inf.inf r x\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y
by (metis deterministic inf.cases)

lemma star_inf:
  assumes
    deterministic: "\<And>x y z. r x y \<Longrightarrow> r x z \<Longrightarrow> y = z"
  shows "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y \<Longrightarrow> inf r x \<Longrightarrow> inf r y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y; Inf.inf r x\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y
proof (induction y rule: rtranclp_induct)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r x
 2. \<And>y z.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y; r y z;
        Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y; Inf.inf r x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r z
case base

proof (state)
this:
  Inf.inf r x

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r x
 2. \<And>y z.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y; r y z;
        Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y; Inf.inf r x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r z
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  Inf.inf r x
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  Inf.inf r x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Inf.inf r x

proof (state)
this:
  Inf.inf r x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y z.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y; r y z;
        Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y; Inf.inf r x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r z
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y z.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y; r y z;
        Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y; Inf.inf r x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r z
case (step y z)

proof (state)
this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y
  r y z
  Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y
  Inf.inf r x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y z.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y; r y z;
        Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y; Inf.inf r x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r z
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y
  r y z
  Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y
  Inf.inf r x
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y
  r y z
  Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y
  Inf.inf r x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Inf.inf r z
using step_inf deterministic

proof (prove)
using this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y
  r y z
  Inf.inf r x \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf r y
  Inf.inf r x
  \<lbrakk>\<And>x y z.
              \<lbrakk>?r x y; ?r x z\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> y = z;
   ?r ?x ?y; Inf.inf ?r ?x\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> Inf.inf ?r ?y
  \<lbrakk>r ?x ?y; r ?x ?z\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> ?y = ?z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Inf.inf r z
by metis

proof (state)
this:
  Inf.inf r z

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
